channel.title: K.H. Infinity Blog - Trade Insights & News
channel.description: Stay updated with the latest insights on international trade, import-export trends, and industry news from K.H. Infinity.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 K.H. Infinity. All rights reserved.

item.title: Global Trade Trends to Watch in 2024
item.description: Explore the key trends shaping international trade in 2024, from digital transformation to sustainable practices. Learn about blockchain adoption, sustainability initiatives, supply chain diversification, and e-commerce integration.
item.author: sarah.rahman@khi.com.bd (Sarah Rahman)
item.dc:creator: Sarah Rahman
item.content:encoded:
Global Trade Trends to Watch in 2024

Explore the key trends shaping international trade in 2024, from digital transformation to sustainable practices. Learn about blockchain adoption, sustainability initiatives, supply chain diversification, and e-commerce integration.

Read more...

item.title: Complete Guide to Import Documentation
item.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding and preparing essential import documentation for smooth customs clearance. Learn about commercial invoices, bills of lading, packing lists, and more.
item.author: abdul.karim@khi.com.bd (Abdul Karim)
item.dc:creator: Abdul Karim
item.content:encoded:
Complete Guide to Import Documentation

A comprehensive guide to understanding and preparing essential import documentation for smooth customs clearance. Learn about commercial invoices, bills of lading, packing lists, and more.

item.title: Implementing Sustainable Trade Practices
item.description: Learn how businesses can incorporate sustainable practices in their international trade operations. Discover eco-friendly packaging solutions, green logistics practices, and carbon offset programs.
item.author: mohammad.khan@khi.com.bd (Mohammad Khan)
item.dc:creator: Mohammad Khan
item.content:encoded:
Implementing Sustainable Trade Practices

Learn how businesses can incorporate sustainable practices in their international trade operations. Discover eco-friendly packaging solutions, green logistics practices, and carbon offset programs.
